body: The card "Kavu Predator" is missing the trample ability. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.28 on WinXP SP3
author: [Jak1...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112622755219524898050/)
title: Trample missing on "Kavu Predator"

comments.body: Because I don't want to open another issue, the card "Benalish Lancer" loses its first strike ability (if it got kicked) at the end of turn.

comments.body: Thanks for the reports, the bugs have been fixed. Please try to open new issue for each bug, it helps us to have a simple mapping between issue numbers and bugs.

content:
_From [Jak1...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112622755219524898050/) on August 16, 2012 19:31:54_

The card "Kavu Predator" is missing the trample ability. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.28 on WinXP SP3

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=278_
